wallet.disclaimer-info: By connecting a wallet you agree to Thales DAO Terms Of Use and Privacy Policy and acknowledge that you have read and understand the Thales DAO protocol disclaimer.

unsupported-network.title: Oops! You are on the wrong network!
unsupported-network.description: You have selected the wrong network in your wallet. To continue, please switch to Optimism Mainnet network.

errors.unknown-error-try-again: An unknown error occurred after you submitted. Please try again.
errors.unknown-error-try-again-general: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
errors.invalid-price-max: The price cannot be higher than ${{max}}
errors.invalid-amount-max: The amount cannot be higher than {{max}}
errors.insufficient-balance-wallet: Please ensure your wallet has sufficient {{currencyKey}}

footer.all-rights-reserved: Â© {{year}} THALES DAO All rights reserved.

disputes-disabled-message.market-closed: The market is closed for disputes.
disputes-disabled-message.creator: The creator of the market doesn't have the right to open disputes.
disputes-disabled-message.council-members: Council members don't have the right to open disputes.

voting-option.accept-slash: Accept the dispute and slash the creator
voting-option.accept-no-slash: Accept the dispute but do not slash the creator
voting-option.refuse-on-positioning: Refuse the dispute and slash the wallet that raised it
voting-option.accept-result: Accept the dispute and set a result
voting-option.accept-reset: Accept the dispute and reset market result
